synopsis.text: To the delight of fans, Dragon Ball Super picks up the story after the epic battle against Majin Buu, as our beloved heroes strive to maintain peace on Earth. Goku, now a humble radish farmer, yearns for a new challenge, while the rest of the Z warriors enjoy their peaceful lives. But tranquility never lasts long in the Dragon Ball universe. A formidable force stirs in the depths of the cosmos: Beerus, the merciless God of Destruction. Troubled by a prophecy that foretells his defeat by a mysterious 'Super Saiyan God,' Beerus embarks on a quest to find and confront this enigmatic being. His search leads him to Earth, where he encounters Goku and his powerful friends. As Beerus sets his sights on our planet, can Goku and the Z warriors rise to the occasion and defend Earth from the whims of this destructive deity? Witness the unfolding of this action-packed adventure as our heroes face their most powerful adversary yet.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
